Our christmas sweatshirt has five sizes of S/M/L/XL/XXL, which is very suitable for multiple purchases to take photos of family and friends gatherings. And it is also very suitable for daily wear, such as music festivals, beaches, squares, appointments, travel, bars, etc.
GREATLY PAIR WITH: Our beautiful elegant lightweight christmas sweater is easy to match. You can match trousers, jeans, long skirts, boots, bibs, etc. And it is suitable for school, office, work, beach, daily party, trip, halloween, birthday, especially christmas, a good gift for any christmas event, If you wear this shirt on christmas, you will get a lot of praise.
QUALITY AFTER-SALES : We promise to provide quality after-sales service. If you are not satisfied with your clothes, contact us at any time, we will try our best to solve your all questions. Welcome to ASTANFY shop to order goods and please search “ASTANFY” on amazon for more of our products.

Made of 50% cotton and 50% polyester, this pullover is a year round go-to garment for all your outdoor activities, on or off the bike. A ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $45.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:40:42 UTC – Details)


Harley-Davidson Men’s Lightning Crest Pullover Fleece Sweatshirt, 30299602. This sweatshirt has all the appointments you want, the graphic details and the right cotton blend. Made of 50% cotton and 50% polyester, this pullover is a year round go-to garment for all your outdoor activities, on or off the bike. A Wisconsin Harley-Davidson Bar & Shield logo is placed on the left breast and bold Harley-Davidson block lettering is printed down the sleeves. The best is saved for the backside with a very large Harley-Davidson skull graphic with eagle wings. With rib-knit cuffs, you’ll stay warm even in the coldest breeze. This is sure to be a sweatshirt that you’ll wear time and time again. 30299602.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.71 x 8.46 x 3.58 inches; 13.12 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 3029960203
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 10, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Bravado
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B077BLF68D

Soft and comfortable, made from 50% cotton and 50% polyester
Front features Wisconsin Harley-Davidson dealer screen printed graphic
Back is decked out with a very large Harley-Davidson skull graphic with eagle wings
This pullover is a year round go-to garment for all your outdoor activities, on or off the bike
